title: What will you do in the final hours before the apocalypse results death? - Quora

response.answer_text: If I know for sure I’m a goner and assuming everything’s still going as normal. I would put Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban on and order from my favorite local pizza place. Then I would get in bed with all my pillows and blankets, my pets and my fiancé. We would cuddle and eat pizza and watch a nostalgic film. Just go out comfortable and loved.
I've answered similar questions before-there is this ONE lady…BIG Hooters!!! I'd love to see them just once…. And I think she'd let me😌
